text: Gage Park is one of Chicago's 77 well-defined community areas, located on the city's southwest side. Gage Park's population is largely working-class, and its housing stock is mostly bungalows. For generations, the neighborhood was Eastern European and Irish Catholic. The neighborhood remains overwhelmingly Catholic with the addition of many Hispanic residents. On February 4, 2016, the bodies of six people were discovered in a home on the 5700 block of South California Avenue. ==Other websites== * Official City of Chicago Gage Park Community Map * Chicago Park District: Gage Park Category:Community areas of Chicago
title: Gage Park, Chicago
